name: Trivial Television 2 Online Trivia | Mixture: Comedy | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who played Oscar Madison's ex-wife on "The Odd Couple"?
questions.explanation:
Brett Somers.

	Brett Somers was still married to Jack Klugman (Oscar Madison) when she portrayed his ex-wife on the show.  They did eventually divorce.

questions.text: What is the name of the theme song on "The Mary Tyler Moore Show"?
questions.explanation:
"Love is all around".

	Before starring in her own sitcom, Mary Tyler Moore played Laura Petrie on "The Dick Van Dyke Show".

questions.text: What was the last name of the character Larry on "Three's Company"?
Who played Bub O'Casey on "My Three Sons"?
questions.explanation:
William Frawley.

	William Frawley had already achieved television fame as Fred Mertz on "I Love Lucy".  "My Three Sons" aired on CBS from 1960-1965 and then ABC from 1965-1972.

questions.text: How was Granny related to Jed Clampett on "The Beverly Hillbillies"?
questions.explanation:
His mother-in-law.

	Irene Ryan played the hilarious role of Granny Daisy Moses.  The show aired from 1962-1971.

questions.text: Who played Uncle Martin on "My Favorite Martian"?
questions.explanation:
Ray Walston & Walston.

	"My Favorite Martian" aired from 1963-1966.  The 1999 movie version of the program starred Christopher Lloyd as Uncle Martin and Jeff Daniels portraying the role of Tim O'hara that Bill Bixby had played on the TV series.

questions.text: What was the Skipper's first name on "Gilligan's Island"?
questions.explanation:
Jonas.

	Skipper Jonas Grumby, was portrayed by Alan Hale, Jr.  "Gilligan's Island" aired from 1964-1967.

questions.text: What was the name of the cab company on "Taxi"?
questions.explanation:
Sunshine.

	"Taxi" took place in NYC at the fictional Sunshine Taxi Cab Company.  The show aired from 1978-1982 on ABC and then 1982-1983 on CBS.

questions.text: Joey Lawrence played Nick Russo on "Blossom".
questions.explanation:
False.

	Joey Lawrence played Joey Russo.  Nick Russo was the dad on the show and was played by Ted wass, who had already had found TV fame on the show "Soap".  "Blossom" starred Mayim Bialik as the title character and aired from 1991-1995.

questions.text: How many actors played little Ricky on "I Love Lucy"?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Twins Richard and Ronald Simmons first played little Ricky in 1953. Then twins Michael and Joseph Mayer portrayed him from 1954-1956. And finally Richard Keith played little Ricky for the shows last season (1956-1957).
